name: SlamBlast
description:
In the modern digital age, the media has made a universal decision that the only two verbs we should use to describe an attack are "slam" and "blast."

SlamBlast is a platform fighter POC that takes this comedic news trope literally. Enter 2 to 4 player fights wherein your only attacks are "slam" and "blast." Collect the magic spinning hexagons which randomly appear to decrease your vulnerability percentage and rewind your movement to avoid opponents and escape death when taking daring leaps after a collectible. 

Use 2 to 4 PC controllers compatible with XInput to play. Player 1 can use the "Back" button to return to the main menu at any time.

NOTE: This demo was made in just a handful of hours as a POC. There will be bugs.
